com.topcoder.clients.dao
Interface GenericDAO<T extends com.topcoder.clients.model.AuditableEntity,Id extends java.io.Serializable>

Type Parameters:
T - The entity type to operate
Id - The type of id of entity
All Known Subinterfaces:
ClientDAO, ClientDAOLocal, ClientDAORemote, ClientStatusDAO, ClientStatusDAOLocal, ClientStatusDAORemote, CompanyDAO, CompanyDAOLocal, CompanyDAORemote, ProjectDAO, ProjectDAOLocal, ProjectDAORemote, ProjectStatusDAO, ProjectStatusDAOLocal, ProjectStatusDAORemote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientDAOBean, ClientStatusDAOBean, CompanyDAOBean, GenericEJB3DAO, ProjectDAOBean, ProjectStatusDAOBean
public interface GenericDAO<T extends com.topcoder.clients.model.AuditableEntity,Id extends java.io.Serializable>

This interface represents the base GenericDAO business interface.

This interface defines the generic methods available for all the DAOs: retrieve entity by id, retrieve all entities, search entities by name, search entities using the given filter, save an given entity, delete an given entity.

THREAD SAFETY: Implementations of this interface should be thread safe.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Mafy, TCSDEVELOPER

Method Detail

retrieveById

T retrieveById(Id id)
                                                                  throws EntityNotFoundException,
                                                                         DAOException

Defines the operation that performs the retrieval of an entity using the given id from the persistence.

Parameters:
id - the identifier of the entity that should be retrieved. Should be positive and not null.
Returns:
the entity with the given id retrieved from the persistence.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if id <= 0 or id is null.
EntityNotFoundException - if an entity for the given id is not found in the persistence.
DAOException - if any error occurs while performing this operation.

retrieveAll

java.util.List<T> retrieveAll()
                                                                                 throws DAOException

Defines the operation that performs the retrieval of all entities from the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list.

Returns:
the list of entities found in the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list.
Throws:
DAOException - if any error occurs while performing this operation.

searchByName

java.util.List<T> searchByName(java.lang.String name)
                                                                                  throws DAOException

Defines the operation that performs the retrieval of all entities that have the given name in the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list.

Parameters:
name - the name of the entity that should be retrieved. Should be not empty and not null.
Returns:
the list with entities with the given name retrieved from the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list.
Throws:
DAOException - if any error occurs while performing this operation.

search

java.util.List<T> search(com.topcoder.search.builder.filter.Filter filter)
                                                                            throws DAOException

Defines the operation that performs the retrieval of all entities that match the given filter in the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list.

Parameters:
filter - the filter that should be used to search the matched entities. Should not be null.
Returns:
the list with entities that match the given filter retrieved from the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if filter is null.
DAOException - if any error occurs while performing this operation.

Defines the operation that performs the salvation of an entity in the persistence.

Parameters:
entity - the entity that should be saved. Should not be null.
Returns:
the entity saved in the persistence.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if entity is null.
DAOException - if any error occurs while performing this operation.

void delete(T entity)
            throws EntityNotFoundException,
                   DAOException

Defines the operation that performs the deletion of an entity from the persistence.

Parameters:
entity - the entity that should be deleted from the persistence. Should not be null.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if entity is null.
EntityNotFoundException - if entity is not found in the persistence.
DAOException - if any error occurs while performing this operation.
